 2014-03582014-04-03,  ,  NR,  CRA,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Universities Outside Canada)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (UNIVERSITIES OUTSIDE CANADA) in order to include new qualified universities, remove those universities that no longer qualify to be on the list and update the name and/or address of certain universities.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0081 Publication Date: 2014-04-23
